title: Silicon Valley Isn't Maximizing Profit | Ep 66
description:
How can economic theory explain the political actions of big tech and social media? As high as their profits are, they aren't maximizing them. Instead they're subsidizing their political influence via their  market power.

Show notes:
Big Tech Panel
